Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights hotel feb 2010 checked corner tiny coud hardly move change slightly bigger average single size stay istanbul visited istanbul 9 times stay hotel worst awaken vacuum cleaning corridor 730am happend days row hotel management reads please urge staff clean till 9am disturb people breakfast lobby beautiful free internet business center location super am afraid cant call 4star hotel istanbul city definetely price vs quality hotel
